page.title: 05POPULATION(page 1)
page.content: Nutfield village is divided by the A25 and lies three miles from Redhill. { Mid Street}and{Coopers Hill {Road}have linear housing. There are two bus services . There are two public houses facing on to the High street,{Queen's Head}and{Crown {Inn,}the{Queen's Head}having accommodation. There is an old people's home just off{Mid Street}and {Coopers Hill Road}which was first used as a police training college. There are two garages on either side of the High Street about 150 metres apart. One garage is able to deal with crash repairs,and the other, engineering and MOT. There is a supermarket next to a corner shop,also a grocers. There is a quarry and a primary state school. { The{East Surrey}College,housed in {Nutfield Court,}trains operators on 45 computers.
